title: Activity-Based Online Education for Strengthening Advanced Financial Analysis Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental financial theories and accounting principles, with experience in business analysis
context.additional_context: A course focused on enhancing practical financial analysis skills for corporate managers/leaders, utilizing asynchronous learning environments with digital devices

learning_goals: Evaluate financial ratio analysis and cash flow pattern interpretation skills based on real corporate cases
Design investment decision-making processes and quantify outcomes through virtual trading simulations
Create visualized financial analysis reports and propose business strategy integration plans via team collaboration projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
